name: howl
effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Howls to raise the spirit
and boosts ATTACK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Howls to raise the spirit
and boosts ATTACK.

raise its spirit and
boost its ATTACK
stat.
